summary: The module implements a collection of generator utilities that synthesize inputs, outputs, and auxiliary data for a wide range of machine learning tasks such as audio and image classification, speech recognition, feature extraction, object detection, segmentation, language modeling, and text generation. It also includes a generic random-value generator for testing scenarios. These generators encapsulate the logic needed to create dummy tensors, labels, prompts, and other taskâ€‘specific artifacts, enabling consistent data preparation for model benchmarking.
business_intent: Provide a reusable toolkit for automatically producing synthetic benchmark data and expected model responses across many AI tasks, streamlining the evaluation and performance testing of models in a standardized way.
